_header: Wellaway so dear bought that it shall thus been
_description: A thirteenth-century scrap of English added on a margin

CamGon221.Transcription: Waylowy so dere boht þat it sal þus ben

Robbins,  Rossell Hope. 
             “Middle English Lyrics: Handlist of New Texts.” 
             Anglia
